sections.heading: Terms, defined.For purposes of the Build Nebraska Act:(1) Department means the Department of Transportation;(2) Fund means the State Highway Capital Improvement Fund; and(3) Surface transportation project means (a) expansion or reconstruction of a road or highway which is part of the state highway s
sections.text: Terms, defined.For purposes of the Build Nebraska Act:(1) Department means the Department of Transportation;(2) Fund means the State Highway Capital Improvement Fund; and(3) Surface transportation project means (a) expansion or reconstruction of a road or highway which is part of the state highway system, (b) expansion or reconstruction of a bridge which is part of the state highway system, or (c) construction of a new road, highway, or bridge which, if built, would be a part of the state highway system.SourceLaws 2011, LB84, ยง 2;Laws 2017, LB339, ยง 172.
